movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.overview: Miles Morales is juggling his life between being a high school student and being a spider-man. When Wilson 'Kingpin' Fisk uses a super collider, others from across the Spider-Verse are transported to this dimension.

movies.title: Pet Sematary
movies.overview: Louis Creed, his wife Rachel and their two children Gage and Ellie move to a rural home where they are welcomed and enlightened about the eerie 'Pet Sematary' located nearby. After the tragedy of their cat being killed by a truck, Louis resorts to burying it in the mysterious pet cemetery, which is definitely not as it seems, as it proves to the Creeds that sometimes dead is better.
